articles.title: How 9/11 changed the world, from American civil liberties to the Middle East - The Independent
articles.description: Two decades on from the terror attacks,The Independent looks at how the events of September 11, 2001 still reverberate globally
articles.content:
People often ask: Where were you on 9/11?
For a generation, the day has acted as a marker: in an individual sense, but also in a collective one, by the nature of its inclusivity. Everyone remembers … [+52693 chars]
